util Namespace Reference

The util namespace should take all classes which are of a generic type, used to perform common tasks which are not BibleTime-specific. More...

Detailed Description

The util namespace should take all classes which are of a generic type, used to perform common tasks which are not BibleTime-specific.

See scoped_resource for an example.
